headline: Cloudflare Area 1 - how the best email security keeps getting better
keywords: GA Week, General Availability, Email, Security, Email Security, Area 1 Security, Zero Trust
description: Cloudflare started using Area 1 in 2020 and proceeded with acquiring the company in 2022. We were most impressed how phishing, responsible for 90+% of cyberattacks, basically became a non-issue overnight when we deployed Area 1. But our vision is much bigger than preventing phishing attacks
